question: Which city will host the main event of the International Day of Yoga (IDY) celebrations in June 2017?
explanation: Lucknow, the city of Nawabs, has been finalised to host the main event of the International Day of Yoga (IDY) celebrations. A team of Ayush Ministry officials visited Lucknow and shortlisted Ramabai Ambedkar Maidan, Baudh Vihar Shanti Upvan and Janeshwar Mishra Park as possible venues for the third edition of IDY.
